text: Mohamed Safwat El Sherif () (19 December 1933 â€“ 14 January 2021) was an Egyptian politician and businessman. He was Chairman of the State Information Service. He was the Minister of Information from 1981 to 2004. El Sherif died on 14 January 2021 in Cairo, Egypt from COVID-19 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Egyptian businesspeople Category:Egyptian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Cairo
